item.description:
Super Singles Dance. Saturday Mar. 16th. 8 pm. to 12  This event is listed with multiple Groups

Crowne Plaza 320 Washington St. Newton Ma.  Cost: $12. before 9pm, $15. after 9pm

Discount: I will send Paul a list of names to get you a $10 admission before 9. There is a dress code: No jeans, No sneakers. See Free Parking info below.

NOTE THIS NEW POLICY: The group discount only applies if you arrive before 9 PM!! $15 for everyone after 9 PM. As you pay at the door. Say, you RSVPd with Meetup.Your listing with Meetup.

Join Steve Ob1 and friends for an evening of socializing and dancing, with some new and old friends. If you get there early enough? If you will allow him too? Steve Ob1. will do his best, to make sure you are introduce to as many people as he can.  Therefore as always, If you attend one of Steve Ob1. events? You will not be able to say."I did not meet anyone."  Plus, seats and tables will be hard to hold without a body in them. So, please join us as close to 8 as you can. The doors open at 7:30 pm.

There is complimentary parking in the Crowne Plaza garage.  But, you need to have your parking stubs validated as you pay at the door to the Dance, or the hotel front desk. Do this on arrival instead of the end of dance... It works better for all that way.

Paul, who puts on this dance, has his own meetup group, SuperSingles(TM),

http://www.meetup.com/SuperSingles-Meetup/  Join Paul, he will keep you updated with the upcoming events.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Super Singles Dance
